entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH, Carman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:52 p.m. CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight with risk of a severe thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 6:30 PM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 23. Humidex 25. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 6:30 PM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
